title: NotificationTemplateRenderRequest
description: Request to render a notification template with mock data for preview.

templateSubject.description: Handlebars template for notification subject line

templateBody.description: Handlebars template content for rendering notifications

resource.description: Entity type to mock (e.g., 'table', 'dashboard', 'task'). Falls back to generic fixture if not found.

eventType.description: Optional. Specific event type to test (e.g., 'entityUpdated'). When omitted, generates a neutral ChangeEvent with no event-specific fields.
